charges.charge_description: 18:1029(b)(2), 1029(c)(1) and 3551 et seq.-USE OF STOLEN CREDIT CARD ACCOUNT NUMBERS. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 3 yrs. Probation with the special conditions that defendant shall reside in a community confinement center for a period of 3 monthi; shall make full financial disclosure to the Probation Dept., and shall notify his employer of his criminal conviction. Special assessment: $100.00, due immediately. Restitution: $250.00 per month during probationary period. Open counts dismissed on government's motion. VIOLATION OF PROBATION ORDER-Dft is sentenced to the custody of the Attorney General for a period of six months; followed by a period of supervised release for a period of one year. Dft is to continue to pay monthly restitution. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1029(a)(2), 1029(c)(1), 2 and 3551 et seq.-USE OF STOLEN CREDIT CARD NUMBERS. (2)

18:1029(a)(5) Did knowingly &; w/intent to defraud, effect transactions, with 1 or more access devices issued to another person or persons, to receive payments &; other things of value during a 1-year period the aggregate value of which is equal to or greater than $1,000. [1:98-m-1838]

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 18 months. Supervised Release Three Years. Restitution $17,448.29 Special Assessment fee $100.00 (1)
